label: Pre-Screening Review of Illegal Drug Use
quote: c. Illegal drug use within the past 12 months: An acceptable means of obtaining information related to drug use is through employee self-certification, by public records check; or if the contractor or subcontractor already has drug testing in place. There is no requirement for contractors and/or subcontractors to initiate a drug testing program if they do not have one already in place.

label: Pre-Screening Review of Misconduct (Fraud or Theft)
quote: d. Misconduct such as criminal activity on the job relating to fraud or theft within the past 12 months: An acceptable means of obtaining information related to misconduct is through employee self-certification, by public records check, or other reference checks conducted in the normal course of business.
section: D.8 SPECIAL SECURITY REQUIREMENT - CONTRACTOR PRE-SCREENING

label: Pre-Screening Conducted Within 15 Business Days After Award
quote: Pre-screening shall be conducted within 15 business days after contract award.
section: D.8 SPECIAL SECURITY REQUIREMENT - CONTRACTOR PRE-SCREENING

label: Subcontractor Pre-Screening Requirement for Access
quote: This requirement shall be placed in all subcontracts if the subcontractor requires routine physical access, access to sensitive but unclassified information, and/or logical access to IT resources.
section: D.8 SPECIAL SECURITY REQUIREMENT - CONTRACTOR PRE-SCREENING

label: Provide adequate oversight of work products during telework to ensure continuity and quality control.
quote: The Contractor shall provide adequate oversight of work products when telework is authorized to ensure continuity of contract performance and quality control.

label: Follow CBP HB 1400-05D guidelines for Government Furnished Equipment used for telework.
quote: guidelines in CBP HB 1400-05D, CBP Information Systems Security Policies and Procedures Handbook shall be followed.

label: Complete all required CBP training for telework-ready contractor employees prior to telework commencement.
quote: All CBP training required for telework-ready contractor employees, such as the annual CBP IT Security Awareness and Rules of Behavior training, shall be completed prior to commencement of an individual’s telework schedule.

label: Submit training certificates to COR
quote: Once the training is completed, contractor employees shall submit their certificates of completion to the COR.

label: Comply with security requirements in HSAR 3004.470, HSAM 3004.470, and DHS 4300A
quote: Contractor employees shall comply with the security requirements stated in HSAR 3004.470 and HSAM 3004.470, and work according to the guidance set forth in DHS 4300A, Sensitive Systems Handbook, Rules of Behavior.

label: Telework schedule approval and coordination
quote: A contractor employee’s telework schedule shall be approved by the Contractor’s PM and coordinated with the COR.

label: Submit requests to change telework days in advance
quote: Once approved, requests to change a scheduled telework day shall be submitted in advance when possible to the Contractor’s PM, who will coordinate with the COR.

label: PM responsible for time, attendance, and notifying COR of changes
quote: The Contractor’s PM continues to be responsible for contractor employees’ time and attendance and notifying the COR of any changes.

label: Telework during Federal Government closing
quote: If a Federal Government closing affects the Government facility, contractor employees who are telework-ready shall begin to telework at their normal start time and are expected to work the entire day.

label: Request unscheduled telework via PM
quote: If OPM announces the option for unscheduled telework, a contractor employee may request to telework by contacting the Contractor’s PM, who will coordinate with the COR.

label: Telework privileges may be revoked for non-compliance
quote: If a contractor employee has performance issues, does not follow the security procedures, or does not complete required training while in a telework status, the COR will contact the Contractor’s PM and the contractor employee’s telework privileges may be revoked.

label: Use only GFE provided by CBP when teleworking
quote: Contractor employees are required to use only GFE provided by CBP when teleworking.
short_label: Use only CBP GFE for telework

label: Return to worksite if GFE fails or needs repair/replacement
quote: Should the GFE fail or require repair or replacing, the contractor employee shall be required to return to the traditional worksite to perform their duties.
short_label: Return to worksite if GFE fails

label: Contractor responsible for high-speed internet and cost
quote: The Contractor or contractor employee is responsible for providing high-speed internet connectivity for teleworking and will bear the cost of the internet connection.

label: Contractor employee accessibility during working hours
quote: The contractor employee shall be accessible at all times, via telephone, e-mail, or video conferencing during his/her working hours.

label: Use GFE and Government information only for contractual performance and protect from unauthorized access
quote: Contractor employees’ use of GFE and Government information shall be for contractual performance only and shall be protected from unauthorized access, disclosure, sharing, transmission, or loss.

label: Keep Government property and information safe, secure, and separated from personal property
quote: The contractor employee shall keep Government property and information safe, secure, and separated from his/her personal property and information.

label: Teleworkers are sole operators of GFE and must abide by CBP HB 5200-13C
quote: Contractor employees who telework shall be the sole operators of the GFE they use and shall abide by CBP HB 5200-13C, Personal Property and Asset Management Handbook.

label: Teleworkers prohibited from working on or possessing classified information at alternate worksite
quote: Contractor employees who telework shall not work on, have access to, or keep in their possession classified information at an alternate worksite.
short_label: No classified info at telework site

label: Comply with DHS Handbook for Safeguarding Sensitive PII
quote: Contractor employees shall comply with the guidance in the DHS Handbook for Safeguarding Sensitive Personally Identifiable Information.

label: Return all GFE to COR upon separation from contract
quote: Contractor employees shall return all GFE provided by CBP to the COR upon separation from the contract.
